titleStmt.title: A declaration of the General Convention of Ireland expressing their detestation of the unjust proceedings against the late King, in a pretended high court of justice in England.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. General Convention.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at Dublin by William Bladen,

notesStmt.note: "I. of May 1660 Ordered that this Declaration be forthwith Printed and Published. Mat. Barry Cl. of the General Convention of Ireland."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
